products.title: Valencia Orange Embers Roller Blind

This orange fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.

products.description: Stirlo tiger orange plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube.
